summary:
A replacer for the Imperial Armors and added a new armor, Imperial Mage Armor, to be used with the CBBEv3 body type. 
Made the armors craftable and improvable and non-replacers
Works with the weight slider.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod ever for any game.  With this I learned how to use Blender, Nifskope, and TESsnip and the CK.  Also, the weight function on blender is a big ol pain lol.  I hope everyone enjoys and checks out the mod. I look forward to your feedback, so please, leave a comment :)

I want to thank everyone for your patience as I roll out my first mod. I learned a lot so far... I think the most important thing I learned was not to upload a mod to the community untill its 100% done... That didnt happen here, but in the future it will :)  I still have retextureing to do jsut to shore up some of the edges.

What my mod is: 
A replacer for the Imperial Armors and added a new armor, Imperial Mage Armor, to be used with the CBBEv3 body type. 
Made the armors craftable and improvable and non-replacers
Works with the weight slider.


------Updated: 2/10/2012:
Released all 4 armors as non-replacers :)
Heavy
Med
Light
Mage (works with mage armor perk)

fixed seam and clipping errors!!

------Updated 2/2/2012:
New main file includes both studded and heavy replacement armors.
Fixes all seams issues.
Fixes all clipping issues

------Updated 2/1/2012:
Added a heavy armor version!!

------Updated 1/27/2012:
Updated main file with body for CBBEv3, fixed some seams.
CBBEv2 compatable file under optional files.

------Requirements:
[url=\"http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666][color=\"#FF0000\"]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/color][/url] v3

------Bugs:
Should be none now!!! But i\'m not perfect. Please let me know if you notice any :)

------Things to Come:
Retexturing :)
author: Cecil101

files.name: Studded_ Heavy_ Light_ and Mage armors
